item.title: Vijay Deverakonda’s Car Hits Accident Near Gadwal, Actor Unhurt
item.description:
<![CDATA[Vijay Deverakonda’s Car Hits Accident Near Gadwal, Actor Unhurt
Entertainment
oi-Ruchika Pareek
Actor Vijay Deverakonda, 36, narrowly escaped injury after the car he was traveling in met with an accident on Monday in the Jogulamba Gadwal district of Telangana. The collision occurred on the Hyderabad-Bengaluru National Highway near Undavalli, but fortunately, the Tollywood star was unharmed.
Deverakonda was traveling from Puttaparthi in Andhra Pradesh to Hyderabad when his car was hit from be...]]>
item.author: Oi-Ruchika Pareek

item.title: Vijay Deverakonda Car Accident: Kingdom Actor Escapes Unhurt After Minor Scare In Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Vijay Deverakonda Car Accident: Kingdom Actor Escapes Unhurt After Minor Scare In Gadwal
Telugu star Vijay Deverakonda recently met with a minor accident near Undavalli in Gadwal district, which left his Lexus slightly damaged. According to reports, his car collided with another vehicle on the highway. Thankfully, neither Vijay nor his family sustained any injuries.
Vijay Deverakonda Car Accident
Reports say Vijay was travelling back to Hyderabad from Puttaparthi when the incident occurred.

item.title: Watch: Actor Vijay Devarakonda escapes unhurt in road accident near Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Watch: Actor Vijay Devarakonda escapes unhurt in road accident near Gadwal
The accident took place near Varasiddhi Vinayaka Cotton Mill on National Highway 44 when a truck carrying sheep from Nandikotkur to Pebbair applied sudden brakes
By Telangana Today Published Date - 6 October 2025, 08:02 PM
Jogulamba Gadwal: Tollywood actor Vijay Devarakonda escaped unhurt after his car was involved in an accident at Undavalli in Jogulamba Gadwal district on Monday evening. The actor was returning to Hy...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today

item.title: 'My head hurts'; Actor Vijay Devarakonda's car meets with accident near Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[HYDERABAD: Actor Vijay Devarakonda escaped unscathed after his car met with an accident at Jogulamba on Monday. Devarakonda was returning to Hyderabad from Puttaparthi when his car grazed another four-wheeler. According to police, it was a minor accident with no passengers suffering any serious injury.
As per reports, Devarakonda shifted to his friend’s car to resume the journey. The actor was accompanied by his friends. It is reported that the driver of the actor’s car registered a case with t...]]>
item.author: Keralakaumudi Daily

item.title: Vijay Deverakonda Involved in Car Incident: Kingdom Star Emerges Unscathed Following Minor Fright in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[platform desk
Telugu icon Vijay Deverakonda recently experienced a brief scare when his Lexus vehicle incurred minor damage in a traffic incident close to Undavalli in Gadwal district. Reports indicate that a Bolero vehicle unexpectedly veered right, resulting in the crash. Fortunately, neither Vijay nor his family members were harmed, and they are all safe.
Although the car was damaged, the situation could have escalated significantly without prompt actions.

item.title: Vijay Deverakonda’s Car Meets With Accident Near Gadwal, No Injuries Reported News24 -
item.description:
<![CDATA[Vijay Deverakonda got into a car accident on Monday evening at Undavalli in Jogulamba Gadwal district. Fortunately, the actor was unharmed. He was returning to Hyderabad after visiting Puttaparthi.
---Advertisement---
Telugu actor Vijay Deverakonda's car collided with another vehicle in Undavalli, Jogulamba Gadwal district, while he was en route from Puttaparthi to Hyderabad today. His car sustained damage on the left side. However, there were no casualties in the accident.
